news_header: Everton football club's front-of-shirt sponsor, Stake, is withdrawing its license in Great Britain following an investigation into an advertisement featuring porn actress Bonnie Blue.
news_original_title: Everton sponsor leaves UK after porn ad probe
news_text: The Gambling Commission is warning clubs about their responsibilities regarding unlicensed gambling sites. Stake will cease operations in Great Britain on March 11 and focus on obtaining local licenses. Premier League clubs will stop using gambling companies as main sponsors by the end of the 2025-26 season amid increasing scrutiny of gambling in sports.
